changelog.change: Fixed icons not hiding properly when tapping
Separated hide notifications on lockscreen and notification center
You can now select number of taps required to hide/unhide icons
Added touch to reveal icons when using the timer

descriptionlist.description: Completely disable notifications or just hide them via mute switch, CC toggle or in selected apps

Options:
  • Disable sound/vibration(when enabled)

  • Disable banners(when enabled)

  • Hide notifications on lockscreen and notification center
  • Select apps to disable notifications in

  • Choose apps to only disable banners

  • Hide notifications animated

  • Small vibration when Pluto is active and a notification arrives
Hide icons on homescreen via double tap, autohide w/ timer, mute switch or CC toggle.

Options:
  • Hide icons with mute switch

  • Hide icons with CC toggle

  • Hide Icons with tap(number of taps can be changed via settings)

  • Hide icons by timer
  • Reveal icons by touching screen when using timer
When Use Timer is enabled, the icons are hidden until you tap or touch(if enabled) the screen or move in and out of apps then autohide again after your designated time limit.
When icons are hidden by the switch or CC toggle tapping will do nothing
